text: Drama is the debut full-length album of Swedish indie pop musician Montt Mardié. It was released on November 7, 2005 by the Swedish record label Hybris. The album is very pop oriented, allowing many different tempos and styles to be placed next to one another. References to a girl named Annie are made throughout in more than five of the album's twelve songs. ==Track listing== == External links == * Category:Montt Mardié albums
title: Drama (Montt Mardié album)
